githubRelease.body:
## docs

- [3d54c7f](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/commit/3d54c7f4fa8c30fae92dc2dee6a9727b1202ef5d) docs: Clarified the requirements for the apiKey and baseURL properties

## Fixes

- [d036046](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/commit/d036046b9b16ab3ec83baa2969fdd51dd09d5d19) fix: replace role field instead of concatenating in delta accumulation

- [aa3e455](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/commit/aa3e455353d83897ed1559fc40dbd2a22816e948) Fix should retry header result check

## Features

- Add service_tier property to chat parameters

### Claude

- [fb509a8](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/commit/fb509a8344336f6041395b6fcca9bcaba7014da8) Add for Claude by default header "anthropic-version"="2023-06-01"
- [a145091](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/commit/a145091df7d118e06718f410e69d887f678914fd) Set automatically "x-api-key" header for anthropic

## New
- support tools
- support response_format


## Fix

- [fe3e95b](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/commit/fe3e95b162bae77bc2e5a0f10f0704c0e7227f4b) Fix `This` for chat helper callbacks. It must the passed parameters instance
- [1a456e3](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/commit/1a456e399c883c5a8f7891b09fea29f0f8e44606) Fix TU: moderation model selection

githubRelease.name: Chat helper stream
githubRelease.body:
- Fix some callback calls
- Allow to put stream: true for chat helper

FormDemo: contains come with chat helpers, shift down when creating a chat to active stream

githubRelease.name: Error info + onXXX callbacks
githubRelease.body:
### Errors
If the server returns an error, it will be an instance of [OpenAIError](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/blob/main/Documentation/Classes/OpenAIError.md).
This class has several computed properties to identify the type of error (see documentation).

A new parameter, "throw", in [$parameters](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/blob/main/Documentation/Classes/OpenAIParameters.md) allows synchronous code to throw the error directly. Alternatively, you can call the "throw" function on the result object.

### Callback
New callback options:

- onTerminate: Alias for formula.
- onError: Called only if an error occurs.
- onResponse: Called only on success.
- onData: For chat streaming mode, this replaces the formula (if defined) for each streamed result.

githubRelease.name: Fix + doc
githubRelease.body:
- Fix chat helper initialization if asynchrone
- Fix "terminated" value on result if asynchrone
- Rename `OpenAIChatCompletionParameters` to `OpenAIChatCompletionsParameters`

`+` more documentations

githubRelease.name: Usage & rate limits
githubRelease.body:
## Features

New fields `usage` & `rateLimit` in `OpenAIResult` object, filled if relevant

## Fix

- Chat helper failed to build before fix
- `terminated` status if async was false in callback (because we are in HTTP `onTerminate`), so forced to True 

## Demo

- add embeddings tab
- add models tab

githubRelease.name: stream chat completions
githubRelease.body:
### Stream chat completions

Now available with `stream=True`

### New fields

- custom HTTP headers
- custom HTTP Agent

### Demo Form

_Chat_/_Image_/_Vision_/_Moderation_

githubRelease.name: Async Execution
githubRelease.body:
## TU  
- Test asynchronous requests  

## Reliability  
- Warn if an asynchronous request uses a formula but the current process is expected to terminate  

## Cleanup  
- Fewer assertions (OpenAPI will handle responses instead)  
- Improved assertion messages for null parameters  
- Made all `formulaXXX` and `worker` parameters private  

## Tools  
- Reviewed and improved test code for documentation generation

githubRelease.name: First test release
githubRelease.body:
class store `AIKit`

**Documentations**

- https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/blob/main/README.md
- https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/blob/main/Documentation/Classes/OpenAI.md

**Tests**

Need to setup an OpenAI key in [TestOpenAI](https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/blob/main/Project/Sources/Methods/TestOpenAI.4dm)
Then all methods are prefixed by `test_`
- https://github.com/4d/4D-AIKit/tree/main/Project/Sources/Methods

githubRelease.name: v1.0.0
githubRelease.body:
## What's Changed
* Fix links to classes documentations in README by @mesopelagique in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/1
* Dev standalone by @DamienFuzeau in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/2
* 4D 20R by @delahaye-4D in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/6
* Empty trash and remove empty Compiler_Methods by @e-marchand in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/7
* Ci by @pfhuillet in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/9
* Refactor GitHub Actions workflows: update build and release steps to  by @pfhuillet in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/10

## New Contributors
* @mesopelagique made their first contribution in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/1
* @DamienFuzeau made their first contribution in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/2
* @delahaye-4D made their first contribution in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/6
* @e-marchand made their first contribution in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/7
* @pfhuillet made their first contribution in https://github.com/4d/Build4D/pull/9

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/4d/Build4D/commits/v1.0.0
